title: Spent RP by accident .___.
body:
Hey I know this seems kinda aghr XD I bought some RP so i could buy a poppy skin, before I spent my rp i decided to buy nid cause i really want to play her, but i bought her with my RP insted of my IP.

I mean im out of refunds cause when i was level 3 i refunded garen, ashe and annie XDDD

was just wondering if anything can be done and if not then oh well XD

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you and see if there could be any options.  If your refunds tokens are all used we might not be able to, but let's try and find out!  Hit us up by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will respond asap!  Thanks for your patience!
I don't know why I laughed at this post.
